Sun., Oct. 1: Be a part of this grassroots movement to repeal Kris Kobach's attacks on voting rights.
  


Let People Vote Launch Event

Sunday, October 1, 6:30 p.m.
Lied Center of Kansas
1600 Stewart Dr

RSVP with People Power

Let People Vote

Join us on Sunday, October 1 for a kick off event in Lawrence, which will be live streamed around the country as a powerful rebuke to the anti-voting agenda of Donald Trump, Kris Kobach, and this White House.

Already, activists in communities all across Kansas are gearing up to mobilize with the ACLU's People Power program to fight for our voting rights and increase citizen participation.

Let People Vote Launch Event
Sunday, October 1, 6:30 p.m.
Lied Center of Kansas
1600 Stewart Dr
Lawrence, KS 66045
RSVP with People Power

Kris Kobach and his cohorts think we're going to sit back and let them rip apart our constitutional right to vote. Well, they're wrong.

RSVP today to say that you'll be a part of this grassroots movement to repeal Kris Kobach's attacks on voting rights and to increase citizen participation in Kansas elections.

Thanks for all you do.

RSVP with People Power
